function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction in visits to green spaces due to mobility restrictions and fear of infection during the pandemic","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and well-being due to reduced interaction with nature","Mitigation":"Implement measures to enable safe access to green spaces, and promote the benefits of nature interaction","Technologies":"Digital tools for virtual nature experiences, and contactless access systems for green spaces","People":"General population, especially those living in urban areas","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lockdown and closure of public green spaces by the Polish government in response to the pandemic","Impact":"Reduction in access to nature, leading to negative mental health outcomes","Mitigation":"Advocate for the safe operation of green spaces and provide guidelines for safe visitation","Technologies":"Digital platforms for virtual nature experiences, and remote monitoring systems for public green spaces","People":"General population, especially those residing in areas with limited green spaces","Owner":"Local governments, environmental organizations, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Belief in the necessity of access to green spaces for mental health and well-being during the pandemic","Impact":"Highlighting the importance of nature interaction for mental health and well-being during times of crisis","Mitigation":"Promote the benefits of nature interaction and encourage the maintenance of indoor and outdoor greenery","Technologies":"Social media platforms for awareness campaigns, and digital tools for home gardening and plant care","People":"General population seeking mental health support during the pandemic","Owner":"Public health authorities, mental health organizations, and community groups"}]}
